nodes.text: The Jovaria system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlanes to the Lemmi, Selab, and Thrakia systems. The Jovaria system was home to the species of fern known as the Jovarian sun fern.
The Jovaria system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
